title: COSCO Box Cutter Knife with Shielded Blade Storage Compartment / 6" x 2" Black and Blue Easycut Self Retracting Cutter and Holster (091524)
description: "Stay safe and productive with this multi-purpose retractable box cutter! High quality 6"" x 2"" lightweight plastic self-retracting knife includes clip-on tethered safety holster and spare blade storage compartment. Perfect for warehouse workers, construction workers, home projects and more. Key features include safety lock, blade adjust, depth guide, spare blade storage, squeeze-to-engage grip and safety shield holster with removable spiral cord. Includes:
